info.title: Vybe Search API for use with the Vybe Toolkit

post.summary: Upload facet rank position JSON file for importing into Vybe

parameters.name: ImportTaskId

get.summary: Get the instant search page for your website, this is used for quick searching.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name along with the searh phrase to get instant search results.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: SearchPhrase
parameters.description: This is the search phrase the customer has typed into the search bar

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit the amount of products returned back. i.e. to show no more than 5 send 5 as the Limit.

parameters.name: ResultsType
parameters.description: Set the amount of product data to return.  This can be either IDS or PRODUCT

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: Currency of products to be returned back.  This assumes you have supplied products in these currencies.  Use the 3 Digit ISO code.

404.description: No search results were found for this search phrase.

get.summary: Get the merch page for your website.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name with a merch page id to retrieve the full merch page JSON data.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: ClientMerchPageId
parameters.description: Client Merch Page ID, this is your internal ID you pass to us in the page feed

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: 3 Digit ISO Currency code.  for example. GDP, FRA, USD etc.

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: How many products to get, i.e. 10 products

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many products to skip, for example if we are showing 10 products per page and are page two we would supply skip the first 10.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Which Sort to apply to the dataset

404.description: No merch page found for this site name, token and merchpageid.

get.summary: Get the merch page for your website for a given URL.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name with a URL to retrieve the full merch page JSON data.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: URL, the URL that the merch page corresponsds to

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: 3 Digit ISO Currency code.  for example. GDP, FRA, USD etc.

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: How many products to get, i.e. 10 products

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many products to skip, for example if we are showing 10 products per page and are page two we would supply skip the first 10.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Which Sort to apply to the dataset

404.description: No merch page found for this site name, token and url.

get.summary: Get the sort by options to use on merch and search pages.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name to retrieve the sort by JSON data.

get.summary: Gets all the currently active merch pages for a site
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name to retrieve the merch pages JSON data.

get.summary: Retrieves the active navigation for your website.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name to retrieve you active site navigation JSON data.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: NavigationName
parameters.description: This is the navigation name you set in Vybe admin

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

404.description: No navigation found for this site name and token.

get.summary: Retrieves HTML content for the cms page.
get.description: Supply a valid token and content key

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: Unique key for the site content, you can see all valid using the getkeys API call

404.description: No content found for this content key.

get.summary: Retrieves HTML content for the cms page.
get.description: Supply a valid token and relative page url

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: 3 digit ISO code for the site language. i.e. ENG

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: (optional) Website relative url for this content for example /aboutus

404.description: No content found for this content url.

get.summary: Retrieves HTML content for the cms page preview.
get.description: Supply a valid token and admin page GUID

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: Guid
parameters.description: This is the Guid reference for the page from Vybe Admin

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: This is the Draft ID for the page from Vybe Admin, supplied from the preview URL

404.description: No content found for this content url.

get.summary: Retrieves all valid content keys for use with the get content API calls using a valid token and site name.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name to retrieve all valid content keys.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: 3 digit ISO code for the site language. i.e. ENG

404.description: No keys found for this token.

get.summary: Retrieves all valid content keys for use with the get content API calls using a valid token and multiple site names.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name to retrieve all valid content keys.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteNames
parameters.description: These are the site names used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe.  Use a comma to separate sites

404.description: No keys found for this token.

post.summary: Upload pages JSON file for importing into Vybe
post.description: Allows you to upload all pages for use with retailing for vybe (max 500MB)

get.summary: Retrieves the full product from Vybe for a given Site
get.description: Supply the token, site name and third party product id to retrieve the full product in JSON format.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: ClientProductId
parameters.description: The product id as defined from your system.

404.description: No product found for site and third party product id for this token.

post.summary: Upload product JSON file for importing into Vybe
post.description: Allows you to upload a JSON file for all your product data per site (max 500MB)

post.summary: Upload product stock JSON file for importing into Vybe
post.description: Allows you to upload a JSON file for all your product stock data (max 500MB)

post.summary: Upload product top seller JSON file for importing into Vybe
post.description: Allows you to upload a JSON file for all your product top seller values

post.summary: Upload product pages to set user defined ranks or remove pages
post.description: Allows you to upload a JSON file for all your product pages

post.summary: Upload product to be removed from Vybe
post.description: Allows you to upload a JSON file for all your products to be removed

get.summary: Get the Search page for your website.
get.description: Supply a valid token and site name with a search phrase to retrieve the full merch page JSON data.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: SearchPhrase
parameters.description: This is the search phrase the customer has typed into the search bar

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: 3 Digit ISO Currency code.  for example. GDP, FRA, USD etc.

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: How many products to get, i.e. 10 products

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many products to skip, for example if we are showing 10 products per page and are page two we would supply skip the first 10.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Which Sort to apply to the dataset

parameters.name: DisableSearchRedirect
parameters.description: Disable any search redirects that a query may return

404.description: No search results found for this site name, token and merchpageid.

get.summary: Retrieves trending products and search phrases for the site
get.description: Supply the token, site name to get trending data.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: Token supplied during on-boarding or can be generated from within VybeAdmin.

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: The product currency using the 3 digit ISO code

404.description: No data was found, please try again later once more history has been built up.

title.description: Page title this normally matches with your product category pages.

clientCategoryId.description: This is your unique internal identifier for the page

url.description: This is the URL for the page i.e. /dresses.aspx

parentClientCategoryId.description: The parent identifier for the page, allows for children pages

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website
This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

facets.description: Facet Data for fixing positions on the navigation

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

title.description: Page title this normally matches with your product category pages.

clientPageId.description: This is your unique internal identifier for the page

url.description: This is the URL for the page i.e. /dresses.aspx

parentClientPageId.description: The parent identifier for the page, allows for children pages

pageType.description: This is the type of page for example Brand Page, Promotion Page, Collection etc.

hiddenPage.description: Do you need to see this Page in Vybe or is more for historical reasons, these pages won't be available to merchandise and will follow default rules

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website

productCode.description: Product Code used to identify your product, this doesn't need to be unique

clientProductId.description: Unique ID for the product, this is normally the primary key used from your own systems.  This will be returned back to you in merch API calls

groupProductCode.description: Group product code is a ID field used to group items together which fit in the same style, for example could be used to group together all the same dresses

title.description: This is the customer facing Title for the product

description.description: This is the customer facing Description for the product

metaTitle.description: This is the HTML Meta Title for the page

metaDescription.description: This is the HTML Meta Description for the page

url.description: This is the URL for the product page

excludeFromSearch.description: Hide this product from search results

topSellerValue.description: This is the Top selling value of your product i.e. 7 day sales

customRank.description: This is the a custom rank field for use with balance factors

weightedAvailability.description: This is the Weighted Availability Value use for balance factors

pages.description: These are the active pages this product is assigned to, please ensure you have supplied the pages first using the import pages API

categories.description: These are the categories this product is assigned to, please ensure you have supplied the categories first using the import categories API

productAttributes.description: These are the attributes this product is assigned to.  Only Brand is currently supported.

facets.description: These are the product facets such as Red, Blue, Silk etc. assigned to a product for filtering.

prices.description: These are the product prices, you can supply multiple prices per product for different currencies

dateAvailableTo.description: Do not show product after this date

dateNewIn.description: Used for Sorting By Latest products

updateAndReplace.description: Set to true will replace the product in vybe with the information in the feed so any changes applied in Vybe Admin may be lost

clientProductId.description: Unique ID for the product, this is normally the primary key used from your own systems.

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

stockCode.description: Stock code for the item.  This should be unique such as UPC code.

stockTitle.description: Title for the stock item such as Large, Small

quantity.description: Current Qty available for stock item

archived.description: Set to true once stock item is not available for sale

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

clientPageId.description: This is your unique internal identifier for the page

clientProductId.description: Unique ID for the product, this is normally the primary key used from your own systems.

topSellerValue.description: This is the Top selling value of your product i.e. 7 day sales

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe

clientPageId.description: This is your unique internal identifier for the page

clientProductId.description: Unique ID for the product, this is normally the primary key used from your own systems.

userDefinedRank.description: This is the position you wish to force this product to be in, set to null to revert back to auto position

deleted.description: Set this to true is you wish to un-assign a page to a product

clientProductId.description: Unique ID for the product, this is normally the primary key used from your own systems.

siteName.description: This is the site name used to describe your regional version of the website, as supplied in the feeds to Vybe
